entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 06:41 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: WSW 50 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
